'''''Time and Tide'' (3 December 1955)''' is an issue of the British magazine ''[[Wikipedia:Time and Tide (magazine)|Time and Tide]]''. Included is the first publication of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[Imram]]" (page 1561).<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=51250|articlename=Time and Tide. 1955|dated=|website=TB|accessed=25 May 2013}}</ref><ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 480</ref>

The issue also contains reviews of Elizabeth Jenning's ''[[Letter to Elizabeth Jennings|A Way of Looking]]'' and [[W.H. Auden]]'s ''[[List of books in Tolkien's library#The Shield of Achilles|The Shield of Achilles]]''.<ref name=CG/>
